name: DiceGamePOC
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

LEFT CLICK -> ROLL DICE 
RIGHT CLICK -> RESET GAME

- You roll your dice. Then using the total of the dice you can lift any wooden tabs you want as long as they add up to the roll amount.

- If you can't lift a combination of numbers to equal the amount then don't lift any at  all and re-roll.

Your remaining number of dice are displayed in the top right.
